Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.concurrent

Interface SuspendableQueue<V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalQueue, SuspendableAtomixLoopingPollQueue, SuspendableAtomixQueue
    public interface SuspendableQueue<V>
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Suspendable
static <V> SuspendableQueue<V> get​(java.lang.String name,
                                   int capacity)
                            throws co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        Gets a reference to a bounded queue with the specified name.

        If a capacity > 0 is specified, the queue is bounded.

        If the queue does not exist, it will be created when any offer(Object) is called with createQueue == true; or, if a poll(long) is ever called.

        Type Parameters:
        V - The type of the items.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the queue shared in the cluster
        capacity - The bounded capacity (offer(Object) will return false if the bound is exceeded), or if 0 or negative, no bound is specified.
        Returns:
        A reference to a suspendable queue. Until a method is called on it, its underlying data structures in the cluster may not be created.
        Throws:
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        See Also:
        for an unbounded version of this method.

      • poll

        @Suspendable
V poll​(long timeout)
throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
       co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        Waits timeout for an item, returning it or null if none is available by that timeout.

        Whenever a queue is polled, it is always created if it didn't previously exist.

        Parameters:
        timeout - The amount of time to wait for the queue to have an item, in milliseconds
        Returns:
        The item, or null if the request timed out.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution

      • take

        @Suspendable
default V take()
        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
               co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        Takes an item from the queue, blocking until one is received.
        Returns:
        An item from the queue
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the take was interrupted / cancelled.
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution

      • offer

        @Suspendable
boolean offer​(V item)
        Parameters:
        item - The item to offer
        Returns:
        true if the queue was not at capacity. Always creates the queue if it didn't exist before.
        See Also:
        for more on sending.

      • destroy

        @Suspendable
default void destroy()
        Destroys the queue.

        Destroying the queue does not interrupt existing calls to poll(long).

        Once the queue is destroyed, its backing datastructures in the cluster are removed.

      • exists

        @Suspendable
static boolean exists​(java.lang.String name)
        To the best of the cluster's knowledge, does the specified queue exist?
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        true if it does
